amendment.description: To add a whereas clause regarding President Obama's condemnation of Palestinian violence against innocent Israeli citizens.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2808 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2808 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Blumenthal. (consideration: CR S7956; text: CR S7956) To add a whereas clause regarding President Obama's condemnation of Palestinian violence against innocent Israeli citizens.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2808 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Blumenthal.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2808 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
